pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ragged Grids for 'ggplot2' // Extend 'ggplot2' facets to panel layouts arranged in a grid with ragged edges. facet_ragged_rows() groups panels into rows that can vary in length, facet_ragged_cols() does the same but for columns. These can be useful, for example, to represent nested or partially crossed relationships between faceting variables.
